title: Alumni Survey 2024
completedHtml: Thank you for completing the Alumni Survey 2024!

elements.name: introduction
elements.html:
Introduction

Thank you for participating in the Alumni Survey!

This survey collects information about your education and career since graduating from our university and provides an opportunity for you to evaluate your undergraduate experience now that nearly a decade has passed.

Your answers are very important to us â€” they will inform our efforts to improve the undergraduate experience in the years to come.

If you have any questions about the survey, please contact alumni_survey@example.edu. Thanks again for your participation.

Participation in this survey is completely voluntary. Feel free to answer as few or as many questions as you wish. Please be assured your responses will remain strictly confidential and no individually identifiable information will ever be reported.

elements.name: plans
elements.title: Please indicate the plans(s) you completed in {program}.

elements.name: graduation
elements.title: In which year did you complete your undergraduate program?

elements.name: age
elements.title: How old are you?

elements.name: gender
elements.title: What gender do you most identify with?

elements.name: employment
elements.title: Please describe your employment status.

elements.name: frequency
elements.title: How frequently do you engage in volunteer work?

elements.name: when-decided
elements.title: At what point in your university career did you decide to enroll in {program}?

elements.name: why-enroll
elements.title: Why did you enroll in {program} at our university?

elements.name: statements
elements.title: Please indicate the extent to which you agree or disagree with the following statements:

rows.text: I had opportunities to influence the design of my program.
Overall, I found my required courses worthwhile.
I was satisfied with the content of the courses required for the degree.
I was satisfied with the availability of electives in {program}.
I was satisfied with the opportunity to take electives outside of {program}.
I was satisfied with the number of courses {program}
I was satisfied with the mode of delivery (e.g., face-to-face lectures, online) of courses.
I was satisfied with the variety of courses {program} offered.

elements.name: barriers
elements.title: Did you experience any barriers to registering for the courses you needed to complete your module in {program}? Select any that apply.

elements.name: remove
elements.title: Are there courses we should add or remove from our curriculum?

elements.name: what-to-remove
elements.title: What courses should be added or removed from the curriculum?

elements.name: learning-experience
elements.title: Please briefly describe one learning experience in {program} that had a particularly positive impact on you.

elements.name: overall-experience
elements.title: How satisfied are you with the overall educational experience you had in {program}?

elements.name: use-of-skills
elements.title: How often do you use skills or knowledge learned at {program} in your daily life?

elements.name: matrix-statements
elements.title: Please indicate the extent to which you agree or disagree with the following statements:

rows.text: The environment in {program} department was conducive to learning.
The overall quality of teaching in {program} department was high.
I credit {program} with preparing me to contribute to society as a broadly educated, articulate, and ethical citizen.
I was challenged academically in {program}.
The presence of graduate students in {program} department enhanced my learning experience.
The presence of departmental staff in {program} department enhanced my learning experience.
The undergraduate administrative staff enhanced my satisfaction with {program}.
I received an appropriate level of individualized instruction from instructors.
I had access to the appropriate library resources.
I felt like I belonged to a community in {program}.
Overall, I was satisfied with the quality of interactions I had with faculty members in {program}.

elements.name: discuss-grades
elements.title: Thinking back to your experiences in {program} how often would you say that you discussed grades with an instructor?

elements.name: relationship
elements.title: While studying, did you develop a relationship with one or more faculty members in {program} such that you could ask for a letter of recommendation?

elements.name: aspects
elements.title: What aspects of {program} have been most beneficial to you post-graduation?

elements.name: present-occupation
elements.title: My education did a good job of preparing me for my present occupation.

elements.name: further-study
elements.title: My education did a good job of preparing me for further study.

elements.name: relevance
elements.title: How would you rate the relevance of the courses to your career goals/ further study?

elements.name: course-relevance
elements.title: How would you rate the relevance of the courses to your career goals/ further study?

elements.name: courses
elements.title: Reflecting back on your studies, please indicate the extent to which the following types of courses contributed to preparing you for your current position:

rows.text: Elective courses outside program of study
Courses that focused on theory
Courses that focused on applied work
Courses that emphasized analytical and critical thinking skills
Courses that focused on oral presentation
Courses that focused on writing skills
Courses that focused on teamwork

elements.name: field
elements.title: Of the following, which best characterizes the field in which you are employed?
choices: Natural and applied sciences and related occupations
Occupations in social science, education, government service, and religion
Occupations in art, culture, recreation, and sport
Trades, transport, and equipment operators and related occupations

elements.name: salary
elements.title: Please rate the extent to which you agree or disagree with the following statement: I am satisfied with my salary.

elements.name: professional-school
elements.title: Did you attend graduate or professional school after graduation?

elements.name: degree
elements.title: In what degree or area of study?

elements.name: another-program
elements.title: Did you attend another undergraduate program after graduation?

elements.name: area
elements.title: In what degree or area of study?

elements.name: further-comments
elements.title: Please provide any further comments about {program} that you feel may benefit this curriculum review process.
